Informed Consent

Operative Description

Injection procedure; radioactive tracer for identification of sentinel node (38792)

Laterality

  • Right

Operation Description

  • 5cc of lymphazurin injected into subareolar position and massaged for 5 minutes

Biopsy or excision of lymph node(s); open, deep axillary node(s) (38525)

Laterality

  • Right

Operation Description

  • Wound infiltrated with local anesthetic
  • Appropriate dressing applied
  • Incision made in the usual and sterile fashion
  • Tissue dissected to node
  • Node removed
  • No other blue-stained nodes noted
  • No suspicious or palpable nodes noted
  • Wound closed in layers

Mastectomy, partial (eg, lumpectomy, tylectomy, quadrantectomy, segmentectomy); (19301)

Laterality

  • Right

Operation Description

  • Natural skin line incision performed
  • Flaps were raised
  • Mass excised with appropriate margins
  • Tumor bed marked with radiographic clips
  • Hemostasis assured
  • Wound irrigated
  • Wound infiltrated with local anesthetic
  • Incision closed in layers
  • Appropriate dressing applied
